name: Bottoms Up
description:
Bottoms Up puts you in the shoes of a queer bar owner starting in the 1920s.  Can your speakeasy survive cops, prohibition, and belligerent drag queens?

This is only chapter one, where you play the 1920s.  Future chapters will go up to present day, exploring the growth of the LGBTQ communities through the bar scene.

This bar tries to capture what it felt like to run an LGBTQ bar in history, but it's worth noting that it doesn't address the segregation that was prevalent in many gay bars.

Concept/Design/Hat-Wearer - Mo Cohen
Art and Music - Maria Del Castillo
Code - Yori Kvitchko // SeedBolt Studio
Design - Christian Scandariato
Historian - Dr. Cookie Woolner
